settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content:
BOOSTER EX

Water, Propanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Methyl Gluceth-20, Centella Asiatica Leaf Water, Panthenol, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Polystyrene Sulfonate, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Adenosine, Sparassis Crispa Extract, Glycine, Serine, Glutamic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Aspartic Acid, Leucine, Alanine, Lysine, Arginine, Tyrosine, Phenylalanine, Proline, Threonine, Valine, Isoleucine, Histidine, Cysteine, Methionine, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Rubus Fruticosus (Blackberry) Fruit Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Dipropylene Glycol, Tocopherol, Pentylene Glycol, Artemisia Capillaris Extract, Morinda Citrifolia Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Ascorbic Acid, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Ceramide NP, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Octyldodecanol, Sclerotium Gum, Madecassoside, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Bacillus Ferment, Cichorium Intybus (Chicory) Root Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Sterols, Caprylyl Glycol, Dimethyl Sulfone, Hydroxydecyl Ubiquinone, Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Fruit Extract, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4


Note: The above ingredients have been declared in descending order of their concentrations.



SERUM EX

Water, Propanediol, Polyglycerin-3, Butylene Glycol, Niacinamide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glycerin, Centella Asiatica Leaf Water, Pentylene Glycol, Aminobutyric Acid, Panthenol, Carbomer, Tromethamine, Dimethyl Sulfone, Xanthan Gum, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Ethylhexylglycerin, Adenosine, Sparassis Crispa Extract, Glycine, Disodium EDTA, Serine, Glutamic Acid, Aspartic Acid, Leucine, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Madecassoside, Alanine, Lysine, Arginine, Tyrosine, Phenylalanine, Proline, Threonine, Valine, Isoleucine, Histidine, Cysteine, Methionine, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract, Artemisia Capillaris Extract, Rubus Fruticosus (Blackberry) Fruit Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, Disodium Phosphate, Polysorbate 60, Morinda Citrifolia Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Sodium Phosphate, Tocopherol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Ascorbic Acid, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Ceramide NP, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Octyldodecanol, Cichorium Intybus (Chicory) Root Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Sterols, Hydroxydecyl Ubiquinone, Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Fruit Extract



Note: The above ingredients have been declared in descending order of their concentrations.

settings.heading: How to use
settings.content:
HOW

STEP 1
Spray Booster EX on your face; wait a few minutes to allow for absorption.


STEP 2
Place droplets of Serum EX on your forehead and cheeks and massage gently into skin.


STEP 3
Once serum has absorbed, spray Booster EX a second time for enhanced skin hydration

Note: Finish by applying the Active Cream EX using provided spatula. Massage in.


WHEN
Morning and night as the 5th-7th steps in the Expert RIMAN Ritual, after applying Step 4, Calming Balance Gel.

Click Here for Full Set of Steps

settings.text:
1. Booster & serum work synergistically to protect the skin from environmental stressors while providing deep nourishment, for healthy and bright skin.
  2. High concentration of Giant BYoungPool leaf water (Booster contains 88%, Serum 81%), plant-based extracts, and proprietary complexes provide for a highly functional, dermatologically effective system.

Inspired by eastern holistic practices in self-care, RIMAN aims to improve professional and personal lives across the world by inspiring people to embrace the sacred practice of slowing down and honoring oneself; to view self-care as much more than a chore or routine, but rather an ancient ritual with holistic benefits.
